questions.question: What would you have done if you had won the lottery?
questions.answer: I would have traveled the world.
options: I would have traveled the world.

questions.question: If they had studied more, what would have happened?
questions.answer: They would have passed the exam.
options: They would have passed the exam.

questions.question: What would she have done if it had rained?
questions.answer: She would have stayed at home.
options: She would have stayed at home.
